Background
----------

Canada's Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is inviting Canadian businesses to express interest in providing professional audit support services to augment the Office of Energy Research and Development's (OERD) core audit function.

Objective
--------

The purpose of the professional audit support services is to provide an "_as- and-when- requested" support to NRCan’s audit requirements, specifically for financial and accounting matters. The contract will be awarded for a base period of one (1) year with four (4) one-year option periods.

Key Elements
------------

*   The professional audit support services will be provided on an on-demand basis to support NRCan's audit requirements.
*   The services encompass a wide range of audit and accounting activities, such as staff accounting, audit program development, and personnel audit services.
*   As part of the arrangement, NRCan will not be required to provide any advance notice of audit activities to be supported by the professional audit support services providers.

Contracting Entity
----------------

The contracting entity for this contract is:

*   **Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)**.
*   **Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4.
*   **Contact Information**: Roya Ayam, ottawa.gc.ca\nrnr.st.caouezimertaa-l+n#.636arGerof@NRCan-NRCan-rnca.gc.ca; Phone: (613) 000-0000
